attributes.action: Ban alcohol from the Houses of Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Alcohol is not allowed in other employment environments; it should not be allowed in the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.background: Given that the Houses of Parliament are a place of work where important decisions are made that impact a whole nation it is essential that anything which might affect the behaviour or decision-making of those in attendance should not be permitted.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649910
